description: Episode of Series "Human development: the first 2 1/2 years". Cognition involves the acquiring and use of knowledge. From birth, infants must learn how to learn and develop their senses, memory and perception. This episode discusses the stages of cognitive development as well as examining the theories of Piaget, the roles of recognition and receptive memory and the effect of stimulation in developing cognitive skills.
